dcterms:description: The Penn Treebank (PTB) dataset is used for next word prediction tasks in language modeling, providing a benchmark for evaluating the performance of various models.
dcterms:title: Penn Treebank (PTB) dataset

dcterms:creator: D. Rawlinson
A. Ahmed
G. Kowadlo
dcterms:description: The Stochastic Sequential MNIST (ssMNIST) dataset is a partially observable sequence learning task involving higher-order sequences of MNIST digits, designed to test the capabilities of recurrent networks.
dcterms:title: Stochastic Sequential MNIST (ssMNIST)
